StringTable.STR_PIN_DIALOG_BODY:
Don't have a PIN? Go to www.targetticket.com/account/profiles
Forgot your PIN? Go to www.targetticket.com/account/details
StringTable.STR_PIN_DIALOG_HELP: Type in numbers or use the up/down keys on your remote control.
StringTable.STR_PURCHASE_ORDER_DETAILS_PLAYBACK_BUY_: Purchases are stored in your TARGET Movies library
Playback on multiple compatible TARGET Movies devices
StringTable.STR_PURCHASE_ORDER_DETAILS_PLAYBACK_RENT: Playback on one compatible TARGET Movies device
StringTable.STR_PURCHASE_ORDER_DETAILS_AUDIO_51_SURR: 5.1 surround audio only available with HD (on select devices)
StringTable.STR_PURCHASE_ORDER_NO_CREDIT_CARD:
credit card not on file
please provide a credit card at:
www.targetticket.com/account/details
you can do this from a web browser.
StringTable.STR_PURCHASE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: This rental will stay in your library for the next 30 days. Once you begin watching this title, you have {EXPIRATION} hours to finish.
StringTable.STR_PURCHASE_NETWORK_ERROR_HEADLINE: A network error occurred while processing this order.
StringTable.STR_PURCHASE_NETWORK_ERROR_BODY: Please check your Library, and see if this order was added. If it appears in the Library and you have received an email receipt, the order was processed successfully.
StringTable.STR_FBI_WARNING: FBI Anti-piracy Warning: Unauthorized copying is punishable under Federal Law.
StringTable.STR_SEARCH_NO_RESULTS_FOUND: No results found. Please search again
StringTable.STR_SEARCH_DERICTION: Enter your search term into the keyboard.
StringTable.STR_WISHLIST_NOT_ACTIVATED_INDICATE: Activate your device to see your current Wish List
StringTable.STR_WISHLIST_EMPTY: Looks like you haven't added any movies or tv shows yet.
StringTable.STR_WISHLIST_EMPTY_INDICATE: Browse for movies and tv shows to add to your wishlist.
StringTable.STR_ERR_SUPPORT: Please contact customer support at <font face="Arial Bold">www.targetticket.com/contactus</font> and provide the error code.
StringTable.STR_ERR_NO_INTERNET_TEXT: Please check network connection and try again.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_INTERNET_PLAYER_TITLE: Your Internet connection is currently too slow to stream this video.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_INTERNET_PLAYER_TEXT:
Other connected devices sharing your Internet connection may be downloading large files, or there may be heavy Internet usage in your local area.

We recommend that you upgrade your Internet connection so you can enjoy instant streaming without interruptions:

For a good video experience, we recommend 4 Mbps.
For the best HD or 3D experience, we recommend at least 8 Mbps.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_ACCOUNT_HAS_NO_BILLINGI: No credit card has been added to your account.
You'll need to provide a valid credit card in order to proceed with playback.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_STREAMING_ON_MULTIPLE_D: This title cannot be watched at this moment because it is currently playing on another device simultaneously.
The same title cannot be watched simultaneously on more than one device due to content licensing restrictions.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_TITLE_NOT_FOUND_TITLE: We’re sorry, the title no longer exists or you are trying to play the title from a geographical location that is not supported.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_TITLE_NOT_FOUND_TEXT: Currently, you can only play Target Ticket titles within the United States.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_IP_RESTRICTED_TITLE: We’re sorry. It appears this title cannot be played at your current geographic location due to content owner restrictions.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_IP_RESTRICTED_TEXT: Currently, you can only play Target Ticket titles within the United States.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_DEVICEID_STREAMID_MISMA: We’re sorry. We have encountered a technical error.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_STREAMID_DEVICEIP_MISMA: We’re sorry, the title you are trying to stream is not available or on a different device.
Please reactivate this device with your Target Ticket account and retry.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_STREAMID_STREAMIP_MISMA: We’re sorry, the title you are trying to stream is not available or on a different device.
Please reactivate this device with your Target Ticket account and retry.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_INVALID_TITLE_TITLE: We’re sorry, your rental has expired or your title is no longer available for streaming.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_INVALID_TITLE_TEXT: Please re-purchase the title and retry in a few minutes.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_INVALID_USER_ID_TITLE: We’re sorry, your user name with this device cannot be matched.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_INVALID_USER_ID_TEXT: Please reactivate this device with your Target Ticket account.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_LICENSE_COUNT_EXCEEDED_: We’re sorry. It appears this video cannot be watched on this device because you have used up all your available licenses.
You will need to stop playback from other devices, remove the video, or repurchase it.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_STREAMING_INSTANCE_NOT_: We’re sorry, the title was not found.
Please reactivate your device or update its software.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_UNABLE_TO_CONTACT_THE_S: Please retry in a few minutes.
StringTable.STR_PLAYBACK_ERR_TECHNICAL_PLAYBACK_ERRO: We’re sorry. We have encountered a technical playback error.
StringTable.STR_MODAL_DIALOG_REMOVE_FROM_WISHLIST_SU: the title has been removed from wishlist
StringTable.STR_MODAL_DIALOG_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_HOLD:
This video became unavailable due to content provider licensing restrictions.
It may become available again; please check back later.
StringTable.STR_MODAL_DIALOG_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_LICE:
This video is currently unavailable for this device due to content provider licensing restrictions.
It may become available again; please check back later.
StringTable.STR_MODAL_DIALOG_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_NOTA:
This video is currently unavailable for this device.
It may become available; please check back later.
StringTable.STR_MODAL_DIALOG_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_IN_T: This video is not licensed for playback from within this application due to content provider licensing restrictions.
This video is not licensed for playback from within this territory.
StringTable.STR_ACTIVATION_DIALOG_WELCOME_BODY: Target Ticket brings you instant access to new releases, classic movies and next-day TV
StringTable.STR_ACTIVATION_DIALOG_WELCOME_ACTIVATE_I:
Creating an account gives you immediate benefits:
• rent, buy, download or stream
• free to activate
• easy to use parental controls
StringTable.STR_ACTIVATION_DIALOG_WELCOME_EXPLORE_IN:
Check out our extensive library of over 15,000 titles. remember,
you'll still need to activate this device before you can start watching.
StringTable.STR_ACTIVATION_DIALOG_ACTIVATION_VIA_PC_: Sign in or register with this activation code
Using a web browser, enter code into the activation field at
Please enter this code into the ‘activation code’ field at:
You can do this from a web browser.
StringTable.STR_ACTIVATION_DIALOG_ACTIVATION_SUCCESS: Congratulations, you have successfully activated your {DEVICE} with your Target Ticket account.
{ADDRESS} is the primary user of this device Only primary users can set and manage parental controls.
Please visit www.targetticket.com to create or link an UltraViolet account or to learn more about the added benefits of UltraViolet!
StringTable.STR_PLAYER_TRANSITION_HD_TO_SD_TITLE:
Your Internet connection is currently too slow to stream this video in HD.
For the best HD experience, we recommend at least {BITRATE} Mbps
StringTable.STR_PLAYER_TRANSITION_HD_TO_SD_RESUME_BO:
If your connection speed is at least {BITRATE} Mbps, there may be heavy Internet usage in your local area or other
devices sharing your Internet connection may be downloading large files. Cancel any downloads in progress
or other operations that use bandwidth and then try resuming in HD.
StringTable.STR_PLAYER_TRANSITION_HD_TO_SD_OTHER_BOD:
OTHER OPTIONS
If your connection speed is slower than {BITRATE} Mbps, consider upgrading your Internet connection so you can
enjoy instant HD streaming without interruptions. For now, you can resume your program in SD to help
ensure there will be no further interruptions. You may also choose to stop playback and resume later.
StringTable.STR_PLAYER_TRANSITION_SD_TO_STOP_BODY:
Your Internet connection is currently too slow to stream this video.

Other connected devices sharing your Internet connection may be downloading large files, or there may be heavy
Internet usage in your local area.

We recommend that you upgrade your Internet connection so you can enjoy instant streaming without
interruptions:

For a good video experience, we recommend 4 Mbps
For the best HD or 3D experience, we recommend at least 8 Mbps
StringTable.STR_PLAYER_SWITCHING_TO_SD_VIDEO_PROMPT: Your bandwidth has dropped below the minimum required for HD playback.
StringTable.STR_EXIT_DIALOG_BODY: Are you sure you want to exit Target Ticket application?
StringTable.STR_LIBRARY_NOT_ACTIVATED: looks like you haven't activated your device yet.
StringTable.STR_LIBRARY_EMPTY: Looks like you haven't added any movies or tv shows yet.
StringTable.STR_LIBRARY_DIRECTION: Browse for movies and tv shows to add to your library.
StringTable.STR_PALY_RENTAL_TITLES_WARNING_DIALOG_HE: You are about to start watching "{NAME}".
StringTable.STR_PALY_RENTAL_TITLES_WARNING_DIALOG_BO:
If you start this video now, you have {HOURS} hours to finish watching, and will only be able to watch it on this device.
Do you want to proceed?
StringTable.CHANGERATING_DIALOG_BODY: Use left/right keys on your remote control
StringTable.STR_AUDIO_FORMAT_SETUP_DIALOG_TITLE: Multiple audio formats are available with this title.
StringTable.STR_AUDIO_FORMAT_SETUP_DIALOG_BODY:
Choose an audio format preference below.
You can change the audio format at any time in Settings.
StringTable.STR_AUDIO_FORMAT_SETUP_STEREO_PROMO: AAC 2-channel stereo audio. AAC audio is supported by the majority of playback devices.
StringTable.STR_AUDIO_FORMAT_SETUP_DTS_PROMO: DTS-HD™ is an advanced surround sound technology that delivers a premium home theater experience.
StringTable.STR_AUDIO_FORMAT_SETUP_DOLBY_DIGITAL_PLU: Dolby® Digital Plus brings cinematic surround sound to on-demand streaming movies. Delivering full-impact, discrete multi-channel audio, this advanced technology dramatically improves the listening experience of online entertainment.
StringTable.STR_AUDIO_FORMAT_SETUP_GUIDANCE: 5.1 surround available on select titles. If audio is mute, set the audio format to Stereo and try again.
StringTable.STR_APPLY_GIFT_CARD_DIALOG_INSTRUCTION: Please enter your gift card code:
StringTable.STR_APPLY_GIFT_CARD_DIALOG_NO_BALANCE_IN:
We’re sorry, the Target gift card that you entered has a balance of $0.00.

Please, apply a different Target gift card.
StringTable.STR_APPLY_GIFT_CARD_DIALOG_APPLY_SUCCESS: Congrats, your gift card has been applied
${AMOUNT} store credit has been added to your account.
you now have ${AMOUNT} in total store credit.
amount exceeds the value on the card
Any gift card funds that have been redeemed will NOT be removed from the gift card if you cancel this order.
StringTable.STR_APPLY_GIFT_CARD_DIALOG_COVER_FULL_OR: Congrats, your gift card has been applied
${APPLYAMOUNT} has been applied to your order.

Your gift card covers the full order.

${REMAININGAMOUNT} is the new balance on your gift card.
StringTable.STR_APPLY_GIFT_CARD_DIALOG_NOT_COVER_FUL: ${APPLYAMOUNT} has been applied to your order.

${ADDITIONALAMOUNT} is the remaining balance due on the order.

The remaining balance will applied to your credit card or can apply another gift card.
StringTable.STR_APPLY_GIFT_CARD_DIALOG_GIFT_CARD_LIM: You can only redeem up to 4 gift cards.
StringTable.STR_GO_ACTIVATION_DIALOG_BODY:
Ready to make a purchase?
Want to rate titles or access your library?
Then you need to activate your account!
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_ACTIVATED_BODY_FIRST_LINE: Target Ticket is activated on this device.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_NOT_ACTIVATED_BODY: Activate Target Ticket on this device
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_AUDIO_STEREO_PROMO:
AAC 2-channel stereo audio. AAC audio is supported by the majority of playback devices. 5.1 surround available on select titles.
If audio is mute, set the audio format to AAC and try again.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_AUDIO_DTS_PROMO:
DTS-HD™ is an advanced surround sound technology that delivers a premium home theater experience. 5.1 surround available on select titles.
If audio is mute, set the audio format to AAC and try again.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_AUDIO_DOLBY_DIGITAL_PLUS_PR: Dolby® Digital Plus brings cinematic surround sound to on-demand streaming movies. Delivering full-impact, discrete multi-channel audio, this advanced technology dramatically improves the listening experience of online entertainment. 5.1 surround available on select titles. If audio is mute, set the audio format to AAC and try again.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_KID_CONTROLS_ENABLE_PARENTA: Restrict access to content based on your account settings.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_KID_CONTROLS_REQUIRE_PURCHA: Prompts to enter a PIN before making a purchase.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_KID_CONTROLS_ADJUSTING_MESS: You can adjust your parental controls and change your PIN by visiting:
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_KID_CONTROLS_ACTION_MESSAGE: you can do this from a web browser.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_KID_CONTROLS_NOT_CONFIGED_H: please set up your parental controls.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_KID_CONTROLS_NOT_CONFIGED_B: In order to fully utilize Target Ticket's parental controls, you need to set up a personal identification number.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_KID_CONTROLS_NOT_CONFIGED_U:
Please visit
www.targetticket.com/account/profiles
to set up your parental controls.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_GETSTARTED_BODY:
Welcome to [STORENAME], where you can rent or buy hit Hollywood movies and top TV shows, then watch them instantly on your Television! Choose from thousands of new release movies or catch up on episodes of your favorite TV shows, all commercial-free.

[STORENAME] is powered by [PRODNAME], the cross-platform service that lets you buy once and watch anywhere. Learn more at [STORE INFO URL].

To activate the [STORENAME] service for this device, select the Settings button on the left and then select Activate Device.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_BROWSING_BODY:
1.Select the Store button in the dock on the left side.
2.On the Store page, choose a main browse category from the
left wheel, e.g. “Movies”.
3.Choose a filter option from the right wheel, e.g. “New
Releases”.
4.Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to
view the details page.
5.To purchase the title, select the Rent/Buy button.
6.To find similar titles, select the Similar button.
7.To learn more about the title, select the More Info button.
8.To rate a title, select the Rate It button and use the Left and
Right remote buttons to set your rating.
9.To browse individual seasons/episodes in a TV show, select
the Seasons/Episodes button.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_SEARCHING_TITLE: <font size="{size}" >Searching the Target Ticket store and my library</font>
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_SEARCHING_BODY:
1.Select the Search button from the dock on the left side.
2.Search for a title, actor, director, writer, or keyword by
choosing an option in the search wheel.
3.Use the Up, Down, Left and Right remote buttons to select
each character of the search phrase. Use the Enter remote
button to enter each character when selected.
4.If you are searching for an actor, director or writer, select
their name when it appears in the list on the right side. A
slide-out panel will appear with a grid of titles related to the
selected name.
5.Search results will appear on the right side when your search
phrase matches items in the [STORENAME] store or My
Library.
6.Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to
view the details page. If you already own the title the library
details page will be displayed.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_WISHLIST_TITLE: <font size="{size}" >Manage your Target Ticket wish list</font>
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_WISHLIST_BODY:
1.Browse to a title details page and select the + Wish List
button to add the title to your wish list.
2.Select the Wish List button from the dock on the left side to
view items in your wish list.
3.Choose a category from the wheel.
4.Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to
rent or buy it, view details, or remove it from your wish list.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_LIBRARY_BODY:
1.Select the My Library button in the dock on the left side to
access all titles in your library.
2.The My Library page will allow access to purchases made on
this device, and on your other [STORENAME] devices.
3.On the My Library page, choose a main browse category from
the left wheel, e.g. “Movies”.
4.Choose a filter option from the right wheel, e.g. “All”.
5.Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to
view the details page.
6.To play the title, select the Play or Resume Play button.
7.To find similar titles, select the Similar button.
8.To learn more about the title, select the More Info button.
9.To rate a title, select the Rate It button and use the Left and
Right remote buttons to set your rating.
10.To browse individual seasons/episodes in a TV show, select
the Seasons/Episodes button.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_KID_CONTROL_BODY:
1.Go to [PARCON URL] and configure parental controls for your
[STORENAME] account. You can create a PIN, and choose
which kinds of rated content to restrict when parental
controls are enabled on a device.
2.To enable parental controls on this device, select the Parental
Controls button in the dock on the left side, and enable the
Parental Controls checkbox.
3.To automatically enable parental controls each time the
application is launched, select the Parental Controls button in
the dock on the left side, and enable the Automatically Enable
Parental Controls on Launch checkbox.
4.To require the PIN to be entered when making purchases,
select the Settings button in the dock on the left side, choose
Family from the left wheel, Require PIN for Purchases from
the right wheel, and enable the checkbox.
5.Each of the parental control settings can also be changed
remotely, via a web browser. Go to [PARCON URL] to change
settings for this device.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_ONSCREEN_BODY:
Using [STORENAME] is easy:

1.Select an option from the dock on the left side to access the
main sections of the [STORENAME] application.
2.Select a wheel, and use the Up and Down remote buttons to
choose an option in a wheel.
3.Use the Up, Down, Left and Right remote buttons to browse
through a title grid.
4.Select a scroll bar on the right side of a title grid, and use the
Up and Down remote buttons to quickly page through the
titles.
5.Select a title in a grid, and use the Enter remote button to view
the details page for the selected title.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_CUSTOMER_BODY: If you need help viewing a video or have other questions about [STORENAME], visit [SUPPORT_URL]. You can search the Knowledgebase or contact the customer support team, who are ready to help you every step of the way.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_RENTBUY_TITLE: <font size="{size}" >Renting or buying movies and TV shows</font>
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_RENTBUY_BODY:
1.On a title details page, select the Rent/Buy button.
2.Using the Up and Down remote buttons, choose a purchase
option from the wheel on the slide-out panel.
3.If you have a [STORENAME] Gift Card or Code, select the
Redeem Gift Card or Code button and enter your code. The
value of your Gift Card or Code will be applied to your order.
4.Select the Place Order button.
5.When the purchase confirmation message appears, select the
Play button to start playing your video.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_HELP_UV_BODY:
1.UltraViolet is an all-new way to collect, access, and enjoy your movies and TV shows in the cloud – brought to you by a growing list of companies building UltraViolet into their online stores, video apps, and devices.
2.Instantly stream from the cloud to computers, TVs, tablets or smartphones. Watch wherever you go, however you choose.
3.To buy an UltraViolet title and play your UltraViolet titles from within your CinemaNow library, you first need to link your CinemaNow account with an UltraViolet account.
4.Go to [ACCOUNT URL] to link your CinemaNow account to an UltraViolet account.
5.Find out more about UltraViolet; go to [UV URL].
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_UV_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ACTIVE: Status: Linked to Target Ticket (Expires on {time})
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_UV_ACCOUNT_STATUS_BLOCKEDTO: Status: Blocked due to UltraViolet Terms of Use update
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_UV_ACCOUNT_UVLINKED: Your Target Ticket account is currently linked to an UltraViolet account allowing access to your UltraViolet Digital Collection.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_UV_ACCOUNT_UVNOTLINKED: In order to get UltraViolet access, you need to link an UltraViolet account to your Target Ticket account by visiting www.targetticket.com.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_UV_ACCOUNT_UVDELETEDORFORCE: Your UltraViolet account has been deleted. Please sign in to your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com to resolve your account issue and enable access to your UltraViolet Digital Collection.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_UV_ACCOUNT_UVSUSPENDED: Your UltraViolet account has been suspended. Please sign in to your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com to resolve your account issue and enable access to your UltraViolet Digital Collection.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_UV_ACCOUNT_UVBLOCKEDTOU: Your UltraViolet account has been blocked since the UltraViolet Terms of Use have been updated since you last accepted them. Please sign in to your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com to resolve your account issue and enable access to your UltraViolet Digital Collection.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_UV_ACCOUNT_UVBLOCKEDORBLOCK: Your UltraViolet account has been blocked. Please sign in to your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com to resolve your account issue and enable access to your UltraViolet Digital Collection.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_UV_ACCOUNT_UVARCHIVEDOROTHE: Your UltraViolet account is inactive. Please sign in to your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com to resolve your account issue and enable access to your UltraViolet Digital Collection.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_UV_ACCOUNT_NOTACTIVATED: Target Ticket is not currently activated on this device. Go to <font face="Arial Bold">{URL}</font> to activate Target Ticket and link to an existing UltraViolet account or create a new one.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_SYSTEM_STATUS_PRETEST_GUIDE: Curious about your bandwidth or experiencing trouble with your system?
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_SYSTEM_STATUS_PRETEST_INFO:
This test will determine the following:
- Sustained bandwidth for video playback
- Device Status
- Store Connection
- IP Address
- Registered Email Address
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_SYSTEM_STATUS_BANDWIDTH_LES: A sustained bandwidth of {MbpsBandwidth} MPS is too slow to watch streaming videos at high quality. We recommend upgrading your internet connection.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_SYSTEM_STATUS_BANDWIDTH_GRE: Good News! A sustained bandwidth of {MbpsBandwidth} MPS will be sufficient to watch streaming videos at high quality. You might consider upgrading your Internet connection in order to view HD videos at the highest quality.
Good News! A sustained bandwidth of {MbpsBandwidth} MPS is excellent. You can view HD videos at the highest quality.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_SYSTEM_STATUS_PROGRESS_TIME: This may take up to {timeRemaining} seconds
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_SYSTEM_STATUS_DETAILS_ACTIV: You will be able to buy and rent movies if you activate.
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_SYSTEM_STATUS_DETAILS_ERR_S: and type the following error code into the search box:
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_CC_TEXT_COLOR: choose a preferred closed captions text color:
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_CC_TEXT_FONT: choose a preferred closed captions text font:
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_CC_TEXT_SIZE: choose a preferred closed captions text size:
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_CC_TEXT_OPACITY: choose a preferred closed captions text opacity:
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_CC_TEXT_EDGING: choose a preferred closed captions text edging:
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_CC_BACKGROUND_COLOR: choose a preferred closed captions background color:
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_CC_BACKGROUND_OPACITY: choose a preferred closed captions background opacity:
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_CC_WINDOW_COLOR: choose a preferred closed captions background window color:
StringTable.STR_SETTINGS_CC_WINDOW_OPACITY: choose a preferred closed captions background window opacity:
StringTable.STR_PURCHASE_AGAIN_DIALOG_HEADLINE: You already own this title in your Target Ticket library.
StringTable.STR_PURCHASE_AGAIN_DIALOG_BODY: Select 'watch' to watch the title. Select 'purchase again' to charge your credit card on file for the full purchase price of the title.
StringTable.STR_DEBIT_PIN_DIALOG_HELP: Type in numbers or use the up/down keys on your remote control.
StringTable.STR_REGION_CHECK_DIALOG_NOT_ALLOW_REGION: We're sorry. It appears your content request cannot be played at your current geographic location due to content owner restrictions. Currently, you can only play content within the United States.
StringTable.STR_UV_ACCOUNT_STATUS_DIALOG_NOT_LINKED_:
You selected a movie that comes with UltraViolet, extending the benefits and portability of movies you own through Target Ticket. Because of these additional rights, you'll need to link and UltraViolet account to your Target Ticket account to complete this purchase.

Please visit www.targetticket.com to create or link an UltraViolet account or to learn more about the added benefits of UltraViolet! Once you have linked your accounts, then select 'try again' to complete your purchase.
StringTable.STR_UV_ACCOUNT_STATUS_DIALOG_PROBLEM_ACC: There is a problem with your UltraViolet account

To purchase UltraViolet content, you must have a valid UltraViolet account.

Please log into your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com for more information on your account status. Once you have resolved your account, select 'try again' to complete the checkout process.
StringTable.STR_UV_ACCOUNT_STATUS_DIALOG_SOLVE_PROBL: your UltraViolet account has been successfully [created/linked/renewed/verified].
your UltraViolet account has been successfully linked.
your UltraViolet account has been successfully verified.
StringTable.STR_UV_UNFULFILLABLE_DIALOG_HEADLINE: This UltraViolet title is not available for playback from Target Ticket.
StringTable.STR_UV_UNFULFILLABLE_DIALOG_BODY: For details on where you can watch this title, go to www.uvvu.com
StringTable.STR_LOW_BANDWIDTH_WARNING_DIALOG_PURCHAS: Your Internet connection seems to be too slow to instantly stream {TITLENAME}.
We recommend that you upgrade your Internet connection to enable instant {SKUTYPE} streaming.
StringTable.STR_SPEED_TEST_DIALOG_PROGRESS_TITLE: Please wait a moment while we test the speed of your Internet connection.
StringTable.STR_SPEED_TEST_DIALOG_RESULT_TITLE_NOT_F: Your Internet connection is too slow to instantly stream videos.
StringTable.STR_SPEED_TEST_DIALOG_RESULT_TITLE_FOR_S: Your Internet connection is fast enough to instantly stream SD video, but too slow for HD.
StringTable.STR_SPEED_TEST_DIALOG_RESULT_TITLE_FOR_H: Your Internet connection is fast enough to instantly stream SD and HD video.
StringTable.STR_SPEED_TEST_DIALOG_RESULT_BODY: The speed of your Internet connection will vary depending on the time of day and the current Internet activity in your local area.
StringTable.STR_TARGET_ERROR_ORDER_FAILED: We're sorry, your order has failed.
StringTable.STR_TARGET_ERROR_SUPPORT: Please contact customer support at <font face="Arial Bold">www.targetticket.com/contactus</font> and provide the error code.
StringTable.STR_TARGET_ERROR_TENDERS_NOT_ENOUGH_ERRO:
The Credit Card used for this purchase has insufficient funds or an invalid address.
Please change your credit cards settings at www.targetticket.com.
StringTable.STR_TARGET_ERROR_DUPLICATE_ORDER_ITEMS_B: Duplicate item in order. Please remove duplicate and try again.
StringTable.STR_TARGET_ERROR_UNKNOWN_COUPONCODE_EXCE:
It appears that this coupon code is invalid.
The coupon code is removed from this order. Please check for errors and try again.
